text: The People's Choice Awards 2018 is right around the corner! The show has been a staple during the awards seasons. While most award shows such as the Golden Globes, the Grammys and the Academy Awards are voted on by committees, the People's Choice Awards are voted by... you guessed it, the people! Fans love the fact that they have a say in who wins, loses and what ultimately has dominated pop culture in the past year. Here's everything you need to know about the People's Choice Awards 2018. People's Choice Awards 2018 date You can tune in to see if your favorite actors, musicians, entertainers, movies and shows dominate on Sunday, November 11th.
